title: Crash Experience
report: I seem to be one of the unlucky people that 'crash' very hard although i have noticed it (obviously) being worse with stronger pils or higher in-take.
My experiances often range between the following:

Self Consiousness: A sense that everyone is looking at me and talkin about me.Feeling dirty and that people think i look dirty.Feeling un-loved.Jealousy: A very strong feeling that people are trying to take my girlfriend away.Tiredness and resentment that it is all over.Headaches and sensitive eye's.Suspiciousness: Thinking that people who are talknig to you have a hidden agenda.Get very up-tight and moody and just want to go home.Very emotional and weepy about past events (usually with speed).Insomnia.Still an uncontrollable appreciation of music e.g. i could be brushing my teeth and dancing to music in my head.Uncontrollable shakes.

erowid.citation: SeptoR. "Crash Experience: experience with Ecstasy (ID 2396)". Erowid.org. Oct 14, 2000. erowid.org/exp/2396
